welcome_message_body: Welcome to Markham, Canada! Get ready to experience our city's unique blend of cultural diversity, delicious cuisine, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Markham has to offer.

restaurants.name: Angelica's Bakery
restaurants.description: Angelica's Bakery is a bakery located in Hazel Crest.

restaurants.name: Denver's
restaurants.description: Denver's is a diner located in Posen.

restaurants.name: Gum Wah Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gum Wah Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Midlothian.

restaurants.name: A P Deli III
restaurants.description: A P Deli III is a american restaurant located in Harvey.

restaurants.name: The Submarine Port
restaurants.description: The Submarine Port is a sandwich spot located in Midlothian.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Buttonville Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oshawa Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oshawa Airport is dedicated to serving private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
